title: I Apolagize If Is Not The Correct Forum
body: i cannot log in to the servers it says Logging ON and then just the client is tryin to load.. anyone ?

replies.body:
I have the same issue as a person that started this topic. :(
Literaly the same, I cant login, just sticks on "Logging on..." and nothing happens...

It sounds like your network is having an issue connecting to the login servers.  If you're still having this, go over the troubleshoot steps in our[ connection issue ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any other issues and I'd be happy to help!
Seems like this problem is common and what's more it's not players' network fault. Many people has this issue as I see.
